definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]

sentences.english: It's a simple solid-silver piece at the end of that cord necklace.
sentences.chinese: 这只不过是一根普通的带有银质吊坠的吊绳项链。

sentences.english: Pendant of round brilliant diamonds in platinum.
sentences.chinese: 铂金镶榄尖形切割钻石吊坠。

sentences.english: There are many types of beautiful diamond pendant necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 有许多类型的美丽的钻石吊坠项炼。

sentences.english: Five pendants express the associated relations of gold, wood, water, fire and earth.
sentences.chinese: 用五个吊坠表现了金木水火土的承接关系。

sentences.english: Odd-type button pendants, a variety of styles, welcome to order.
sentences.chinese: 奇型纽扣吊坠，各种款式，欢迎订货。

sentences.english: Pendant with round brilliant diamonds in platinum.
sentences.chinese: 铂金镶榄尖形切割钻石吊坠。

sentences.english: A moderately proportioned vampire bat pendant to aid inconspicuous fraternisation.
sentences.chinese: 惹眼的等比例吸血鬼蝙蝠吊坠。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
